thread.title: BRIEF-Fidessa Group says Andy Skelton joins as CFO
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Fidessa Group says Andy Skelton joins as CFO | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Fidessa Group says Andy Skelton joins as CFO
text:
Oct 26 Fidessa Group Plc
* Andy Skelton joined company as chief financial officer with effect from today
* Andy Malpass stepped down as CFO today but will remain an exec director until announcement of 2015 preliminary results in February 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
